markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Dockhand](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3490)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Working to load and unload cargo from ships, dockhands are considered unruly, but many stay focused and work hard until the job is done.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Dockhand](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3490)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 66

**Perception** +3

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +3, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +4, [Labor Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
empty bottle, whiskey, work clothes (functions as [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=41))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +3 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bottle +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Heft Crate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The dockhand is adjacent to a crate; **Effect** The dockhand picks up a crate and heaves it up to 15 feet. Upon landing, the crate breaks open in a 5-foot burst. Each creature in the area takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage with a DC 13 basic Reflex save, and the area is difficult terrain until cleared.

**Swig** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) The dockhand Interacts to either draw a bottle of alcohol or pick up a nearby unattended bottle of alcohol, then drinks the whole thing. For 1 minute, the dockhand gains a +2 item bonus to melee damage rolls and saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598) but is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-539" />
name: Dockhand
